page.title: 04FARMING:GENERAL INFORMATION
page.content: The area is mainly used for{farming}. ost of the fields had crops,wheat,corn nd barley.The farms are large,most hedges have been removed to give large fields.Barbed wire fences are prominent .The main animals kept in the fields are sheep and pigs,the latter predominate.Pigs have corrigated metal huts in the fields.Hay and grass are stored in great barns for winter feed, silage is also made.Other crops observed in the area were peas,carrots, potatoes and radishes.Farms are highly mechanized and do not employ many people.The poor chalk soils are improved by a large input of pig manure and straw.
